parts.text:
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>The post contains a CMF number (CMF 11240002) at the end. This strongly suggests it is electoral propaganda, as CMF numbers are used for tracking and reporting campaign finance.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>The post explicitly mentions and promotes "Valeriu Iftime" and his team. While not explicitly naming a party, the hashtags "#EchipaValeriuIftime" and "#ContinuămSchimbarea" suggest an electoral campaign.  The image shows two men shaking hands, one of whom is likely Valeriu Iftime. This directly refers to a candidate, fulfilling Article 36 (7) - a.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience.  The targeting data shows a broad geographical reach across multiple cities and counties in Romania. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>The clear call to action "Haideți să votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime!" and "Votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime! Votăm schimbarea!" explicitly aims to influence voters to support Valeriu Iftime. The message focuses on the benefits of voting for this team, directly influencing the electoral outcome. This fulfills Article 36 (7) - c.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>The post does not present itself as journalistic. It lacks objective reporting, analysis, or diverse perspectives. Instead, it promotes a specific candidate with persuasive language and a clear call to action. It does not adhere to journalistic standards.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>The content is not a personal opinion; it's a structured promotional message designed to sway public opinion towards a specific candidate. The language used is not that of personal expression but of political campaigning.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1300565437767751</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It refers to a specific candidate (Valeriu Iftime), targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook advertisement, and has a clear electoral objective (to increase votes for Iftime). The presence of a CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The post's content is promotional, not journalistic.  There are no counterarguments to suggest otherwise.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Valeriu Iftime</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
[Nenițică Andrei], pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook cu ID-ul 1300565437767751, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care promovează candidatul Valeriu Iftime și echipa sa, folosind limbaj persuasiv și un apel clar la acțiune ("Haideți să votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime!", "Votăm #EchipaValeriuIftime! Votăm schimbarea!"), având ca efect electoral creșterea numărului de voturi pentru candidatul menționat. Postarea, care a beneficiat de o cheltuială de publicitate de sub 100 RON, a generat între 3000 și 4000 de impresii și a avut o estimare a acoperirii de 100.000 - 500.000 de persoane, conform datelor din Ad Library.  Prezența numărului CMF 11240002 confirmă natura electorală a postării.  Contactul advertiserului este ionut.voicu.bt@gmail.com și +40759112233.  Postarea nu se încadrează în jurnalism, ci este o formă clară de propagandă electorală, interzisă după încheierea perioadei de campanie.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
